data.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Free Sample Set B
data.detailed_description:
A free sample of healing and support items.

Brave Seed x 1
Spirit Incense x 1
Zeram Powder x 1

*These items can also be obtained in-game.
*These items can be claimed from the DLC tab on the Item page.
*If maximum capacity is exceeded, the excess is discarded.
